> Hi 
Mariann, 
> Hope you're well too, thanks. April 1 is pretty full on my end now. Would April 2 work for an interview with 
this survivor, please? 
> Thanks, 
> Original Message 
> From: Mariann Wang 
<=111==> 
> Sent: Wednesday,March 17, 2021 8:48 AM 
> 
To: 
> Cc: 
Gloria Allred 
> Subject: 
Another survivor 
> I hope you're well. We have another survivor who would like to share her information/what happened to her. If 
you're willing/open, perhaps we could just add her to April 1st, or let us know what you prefer. She is someone 
who was abused by Epstein on one occasion in 2004. 
> Thank you, 
> Mariann 
EFTA00024712
